questions.question: When did Athens launch an expedition against Melos?
Why did Athens launch an expedition against Melos?
options: They had refused to join the Delian League

questions.question: What did Athens do, once they had won the siege of Melos?
options: Killed all men of military age, enslaved women and children
Offered amnesty to the Melian leaders
Destroyed the city but allowed the population to remain
